#	sediment carbon storage scaled from 5 to 20% to reflect net pelagic storage gain
#	reflecting stepwise increased silicate erosion from exposure of continents 
#	during post-90 Ma eustatic sea level fall and continental collisions post 50 Ma
#	in the context of migration of carbonate sediment from shallow to deep regions
#	Storage between 90 and 50 Ma is scaled by 5% (ramped up from 0 to 5% between 90 and 80 Ma)
# 	Storage after 50 Ma is scaled by 20% with a ramp between 50 and 35 Ma 
#	gradually rising from 5 to 15%
#	min, mean, max	in units of Mt C/yr	
0	42.20	47.70	53.00
1	42.20	47.70	53.00
2	42.20	47.70	53.00
